mapper.insert: insert business_point (id, point_code, point_name, point_ratio, point_attribute, point_target, create_by, create_time) values (#{PO.id}, #{PO.pointCode}, #{PO.pointName},#{PO.pointRatio},#{PO.pointAttribute},#{PO.pointTarget}, #{PO.createBy}, #{PO.createTime})

update business_point set point_name = #{PO.pointName},point_ratio = #{PO.pointRatio},point_attribute = #{PO.pointAttribute},point_target = #{PO.pointTarget},update_by = #{PO.updateBy}, update_time = #{PO.updateTime} where id = #{PO.id}
